remarks: Lemma for ~ fta .  There exists a global minimum of the function ` abs o. F ` .  The proof uses a circle of radius ` r ` where ` r ` is the value coming from ~ ftalem1 ; since this is a compact set, the minimum on this disk is achieved, and this must then be the global minimum.
